title: i didin't have any reasons to get banned.
body:
so i didin't get banned!

lesson:if you got banned,you did something wrong,even if you cant see what it was!

replies.body: I got ban for no reason.

After you ticket and Riot still says you have reason to get banned and you disagree with this, you can get filed report of all the reports you have gotten so far and your last 3 month chat log.

https://privacy.riotgames.com

> [{quoted}](name=Elime,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vHKsZajI,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-05-21T16:45:10.354+0000)
>
> After you ticket and Riot still says you have reason to get banned and you disagree with this, you can get filed report of all the reports you have gotten so far and your last 3 month chat log.
> 
> https://privacy.riotgames.com

Thats good intel dude. shame i don't own a credit card to pay the 5 bucks!

>  "Want to get a deeper look into your account? Here's where things get tricky. Pulling the rest of your account info is a bit more difficult due the sensitivity of the info and the amount of work that goes into digging through it. If you're truly concerned about your account and its privacy though, we'll gladly help you out.
> 
> If you want to move forward, we'll need you to follow a special process for legal and security reasons (full disclosure: it involves a handwritten letter and a nominal fee of $5 USD)."

> [{quoted}](name=GRVet3ran0sS,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vHKsZajI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-20T14:47:33.652+0000)
>
> I got ban for no reason.

Get in the queue! tickets away. They are not helping. Haven't seen not a single user with the ban fixed. Myself including

{{summoner:17}}
i got banned after resolving a ticket about not getting emails from riot
i just tried logging in and saw am permaneltly suspended how did u get it fixxed my acc is liek a month old ive never even been chat restricted

> [{quoted}](name=azathoth767,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vHKsZajI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-19T21:20:45.906+0000)
>
> i just tried logging in and saw am permaneltly suspended how did u get it fixxed my acc is liek a month old ive never even been chat restricted

Dude check all forums, there are at least 10 about people geting banned for no reason. In waves. Check also red tracker. I got suspended too, and im trying to fix it at support. Send a ticket https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070
I know is completly unfair. (My account has more than 5 years)

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

Good luck
